verses.verse: The hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was upon me, and carried me out<WH3318> in the spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068>, and set me down<WH5117> in the midst<WH8432> of the valley<WH1237> which was full<WH4392> of bones<WH6106>,

And caused me to pass<WH5674> by them round about<WH5439>: and, behold, there were very<WH3966> many<WH7227> in the open<WH6440> valley<WH1237>; and, lo, they were very<WH3966> dry<WH3002>. valley: or, champaign
And he said<WH559> unto me, Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, can these bones<WH6106> live<WH2421>? And I answered<WH559>, O Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, thou knowest<WH3045>.
Again he said<WH559> unto me, Prophesy<WH5012> upon these bones<WH6106>, and say<WH559> unto them, O ye dry<WH3002> bones<WH6106>, hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> unto these bones<WH6106>; Behold, I will cause breath<WH7307> to enter<WH935> into you, and ye shall live<WH2421>:

And I will lay<WH5414> sinews<WH1517> upon you, and will bring up<WH5927> flesh<WH1320> upon you, and cover<WH7159> you with skin<WH5785>, and put<WH5414> breath<WH7307> in you, and ye shall live<WH2421>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

So I prophesied<WH5012> as I was commanded<WH6680>: and as I prophesied<WH5012>, there was a noise<WH6963>, and behold a shaking<WH7494>, and the bones<WH6106> came together<WH7126>, bone<WH6106> to his bone<WH6106>.
And when I beheld<WH7200>, lo, the sinews<WH1517> and the flesh<WH1320> came up<WH5927> upon them, and the skin<WH5785> covered<WH7159> them above<WH4605>: but there was no breath<WH7307> in them.

Then said<WH559> he unto me, Prophesy<WH5012> unto the wind<WH7307>, prophesy<WH5012>, son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, and say<WH559> to the wind<WH7307>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Come<WH935> from the four<WH702> winds<WH7307>, O breath<WH7307>, and breathe<WH5301> upon these slain<WH2026>, that they may live<WH2421>. wind: or, breath

So I prophesied<WH5012> as he commanded<WH6680> me, and the breath<WH7307> came<WH935> into them, and they lived<WH2421>, and stood up<WH5975> upon their feet<WH7272>, an exceeding<WH3966> <WH3966> great<WH1419> army<WH2428>.

Then he said<WH559> unto me, Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, these bones<WH6106> are the whole house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: behold, they say<WH559>, Our bones<WH6106> are dried<WH3001>, and our hope<WH8615> is lost<WH6>: we are cut off<WH1504> for our parts.

Therefore prophesy<WH5012> and say<WH559> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, O my people<WH5971>, I will open<WH6605> your graves<WH6913>, and cause you to come up<WH5927> out of your graves<WH6913>, and bring<WH935> you into the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>.
And ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, when I have opened<WH6605> your graves<WH6913>, O my people<WH5971>, and brought you up<WH5927> out of your graves<WH6913>,

And shall put<WH5414> my spirit<WH7307> in you, and ye shall live<WH2421>, and I shall place<WH3240> you in your own land<WH127>: then shall ye know<WH3045> that I the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it, and performed<WH6213> it, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>.
The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came again unto me, saying<WH559>,

Moreover, thou son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, take<WH3947> thee one<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and write<WH3789> upon it, For Judah<WH3063>, and for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> his companions<WH2270>: then take<WH3947> another<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and write<WH3789> upon it, For Joseph<WH3130>, the stick<WH6086> of Ephraim<WH669>, and for all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> his companions<WH2270>:
And join<WH7126> them one<WH259> to another<WH259> into one<WH259> stick<WH6086>; and they shall become one<WH259> in thine hand<WH3027>.
And when the children<WH1121> of thy people<WH5971> shall speak<WH559> unto thee, saying<WH559>, Wilt thou not shew<WH5046> us what thou meanest by these?

Say<WH1696> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I will take<WH3947> the stick<WH6086> of Joseph<WH3130>, which is in the hand<WH3027> of Ephraim<WH669>, and the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> his fellows<WH2270>, and will put<WH5414> them with him, even with the stick<WH6086> of Judah<WH3063>, and make<WH6213> them one<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and they shall be one<WH259> in mine hand<WH3027>.
And the sticks<WH6086> whereon thou writest<WH3789> shall be in thine hand<WH3027> before their eyes<WH5869>.

And say<WH1696> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I will take<WH3947> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from among<WH996> the heathen<WH1471>, whither they be gone<WH1980>, and will gather<WH6908> them on every side<WH5439>, and bring<WH935> them into their own land<WH127>:

And I will make<WH6213> them one<WH259> nation<WH1471> in the land<WH776> upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>; and one<WH259> king<WH4428> shall be king<WH4428> to them all: and they shall be<WH5750> no more two<WH8147> nations<WH1471>, neither shall they be divided<WH2673> into two<WH8147> kingdoms<WH4467> any more at all:

Neither shall they defile<WH2930> themselves any more with their idols<WH1544>, nor with their detestable things<WH8251>, nor with any of their transgressions<WH6588>: but I will save<WH3467> them out of all their dwellingplaces<WH4186>, wherein they have sinned<WH2398>, and will cleanse<WH2891> them: so shall they be my people<WH5971>, and I will be their God<WH430>.

And David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650> shall be king<WH4428> over them; and they all shall have one<WH259> shepherd<WH7462>: they shall also walk<WH3212> in my judgments<WH4941>, and observe<WH8104> my statutes<WH2708>, and do<WH6213> them.

And they shall dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> that I have given<WH5414> unto Jacob<WH3290> my servant<WH5650>, wherein your fathers<WH1> have dwelt<WH3427>; and they shall dwell<WH3427> therein, even they, and their children<WH1121>, and their children's<WH1121> children<WH1121> for ever<WH5769>: and my servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> shall be their prince<WH5387> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.

Moreover I will make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> of peace<WH7965> with them; it shall be an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285> with them: and I will place<WH5414> them, and multiply<WH7235> them, and will set<WH5414> my sanctuary<WH4720> in the midst<WH8432> of them for evermore<WH5769>.
My tabernacle<WH4908> also shall be with them: yea, I will be their God<WH430>, and they shall be my people<WH5971>.
And the heathen<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that I the LORD<WH3068> do sanctify<WH6942> Israel<WH3478>, when my sanctuary<WH4720> shall be in the midst<WH8432> of them for evermore<WH5769>.
